data.system_settings: iPhone 6S with iOS 11.0.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 1
data.expected_result: Copied channel should have the same category as the channel you've copied.
data.short_description: Copying channel doesn't copy the category for it
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy a channel which belongs to a category - Observe the category of the copied channel
